items.title: Weaver Services scouts for buyout targets as launch nears
items.summary: Weaver Services, led by Satrajit Bhattacharya, is scouting for buyout targets as they prepare to launch their services. The company has raised ₹1,500 crore from investors and is expected to open by the end of the month, with plans for more acquisitions after buying Capital India Home Finance.
